component.description: DataList is an enhanced version of the standard jQuery Mobile DataList that includes support for offline synchronization.
component.attributes:
&data_component_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
paginatorTemplate false java.lang.String {PreviousPageLink} {CurrentPageReport} {NextPageLink} Template of the paginator.
selectable false java.lang.String Can data in this table be selected? If so, display a form showing the results of the selection.
selectAction false java.lang.Object JSF EL expression that will return detail for a table row based on the URL parameter key.
condition false java.lang.String JavaScript expression that, if true, means the table should be rendered and, if false, means the table should be hidden.
itemList true java.lang.String JavaScript expression that evaluates to a PersistenceJS QueryCollection of objects, each of which corresponds to one row in the table.
itemsPerPage false java.lang.String Number of items to display on each page. If this argument is omitted, then no pagination is used.
rowRenderer true java.lang.String Java script expression that renders a single row of data. Parameters are the parentDiv (enclosing the row) and the row (the row data).
emptyMessage false java.lang.String No records found. Text to display when there is no data to display. Default is "No records found."
emptyGroupMessage false java.lang.String There are no items to display in this group. Text to display when there is no data to display in a group. Default is 'There are no items to display in this group.'
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the main container.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container.
tableStyle false java.lang.String Inline style of the table element.
tableStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the table element.
rowStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class for each row.
dividerStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class for each divider row in a grouped list.
sortBy false java.lang.Object Object field(s) to be used for default sorting.
sortOrder false java.lang.String ascending Sets sorting order. Default is "ascending"
grouped false java.lang.Boolean false Is this a grouped list? Default is false.
groupName false java.lang.String false Function to invoke on a row to get the group name in a grouped list.
groupMembers false java.lang.String false Function to invoke on a row to get the group members in a grouped list.
strings false java.lang.String List of strings to supply to the renderer. Useful for internationalizing boilerplate text via JSF.
type false java.lang.String Set to inset to get the jQuery mobile inset appearance.
